text: welcome to Amazon chime as you get
started you may want to change your
experience here's how to change settings
for both mobile and desktop for mobile
navigate to settings on Android the
navigation is on the top and you can
find settings by swiping left on iPhones
the navigation tabs are on the bottom
the Settings tab is on the lower right
corner on the Settings tab you can sign
out manage your personalized meeting
link and choose who can see your
presence information everyone who has
you as a contact or no one note that the
mobile app is the only place where you
can currently set your presence
visibility for the desktop apps there
are settings that affect your experience
on Mac choose chime preferences on
Windows choose file settings
on the general tab choose whether to set
time to start when your computer starts
or the behavior you would like to see
when you receive a message on Windows
choose whether to have the app icon
blink on Mac choose whether to have the
app icon bounce
on the meetings tab select whether to
suppress Amazon chime notifications when
you share your screen you can also
identify delegates delegates or other
Amazon chime users who can schedule
meetings on your behalf or who have host
controls when attending your meeting
before you add a delegate take the
following steps
make sure that the user is in your
contacts list
they aren't choose add contact and enter
their email address
make sure that the user has created an
Amazon chime account if their name is
displayed in contacts they are good to
go if their email address is displayed
they need to create an Amazon chime
account before you can add them as a
delegate note the desktop app settings
are the only place for you to manage
delegates there are also media settings
where you can set your defaults on the
audio tab select the device to use as a
default for audio input your microphone
and audio output your speakers during a
meeting override these settings by
choosing settings change my audio if you
have more than one webcam choose video
and select your preferred default device
your Amazon chime app is now set up
enjoy your Amazon chime experience
